nodes.title: Bridging Languages, Unleashing Global Potential: Introducing Our New Website and App
nodes.description: Discover our website and app, with native multilingual support and powerful transcription, translation, and voiceover capabilities in 120 languages.
nodes.coverAlt: Bridging Languages, Unleashing Global Potential: Introducing Our New Website and App

nodes.title: VideoTranslatorAI's New Branding
nodes.description: We contacted a very talented designer, Jasmine Lo, to redesign our logo and other visual elements. tes

nodes.title: What Team VT Is Planning In 2022!
nodes.description: Happy New Year 2022, the feeling around the office is that a pretty messy 2021 is done, and we are looking forward optimistically to 2022. Today we are going to talk about our plans for 2022!
nodes.coverAlt: What Team VT Is Planning In 2022!

nodes.title: What Team VideoTranslator Did In 2021
nodes.description: 2021 was a bit of a complex year. As I'm sure it was for many of you. Read more to learn about how Team VideoTranslator navigated 2021.

nodes.title: Merry Christmas!
nodes.description: As we close down 2021, we would like to wish everyone a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year. Thank you for your support this year!

nodes.title: Our Team Is Growing: Welcome Tessa, James & Yuriy!
nodes.description: Team VideoTranslator is growing! Welcome Tessa, James and Yuriy to the team. We are very excited to have you!
nodes.coverAlt: Our Team Is Growing: Welcome Tessa, James & Yuriy!

nodes.title: Year In Review 2020
nodes.description: Read about how VideoTranslator successfully negotiated 2020 despite several challenges. And Happy New Year!
nodes.coverAlt: 2020: May You Live In Interesting Times

nodes.title: Merry Christmas 2020! Thank You From Video Translator
nodes.description: Thank you everyone for all your support. Its been an exciting year, and we hope you found peace and happiness in this festive season!

nodes.title: What Arabic Voices are Available?
nodes.description:
In this article we're looking at our Arabic speaking AI and the different
  voices available. We look at what Male and Female Arabic AI's sound like. Have a
  listen!

nodes.title: Extra! Extra! Read all about it!
nodes.description:
There's a lot of exciting developments at VideoTranslator, which means
  exciting things for you! So you'll be hearing more from us

nodes.title: Happy New Year 2020!
nodes.description:
We had a very good 2019 here at Video Translator. We started to get some
  traction, we found a niche where our tech was useful, and slowly slowly things started
  to come together. We think big things are ahead of us in 2020!

nodes.title: What English Dialects are Available?
nodes.description: What English Dialects are Available?

nodes.title: How We Used SEO To Come Up With A New Name
nodes.description:
We used SEO to determine a new name. Read on to understand why this was
  done, how it was done, and what benefits we expect to get from the name change.
nodes.coverAlt: How We Used SEO To Come Up With A New Name

  empowering, if a little scary.
